version_description:
* fixed bugs with push notifications and online/offline status -> it's possible to be signed in web dashboard and mobile app simultaneously. Push notifications will be received on both devices (in online mode)
* updated visitor list - fixed bug with visitors disappearing
* changes in shortcuts and groups are updated upon visitor list refresh (no need to log out / log in the app for refresh) 
* server communication fixes and updates
* minor updates and fixes of user interface
* updated translations (EN and CZ available. more languages coming out later)
Minor bug fixes.
Bugfixes and stability improvements

- Shortcuts improvement
- Bugfixes and stability improvements

Added new FR, PL and ES translations.
Improved stability and performance
- Fixed app crashes

Brand new app with completely fresh design. We added some features which you already know from our web dashboard:
- Chat history and offline messages
- Detailed visitor info and browsing history 
- Settings - you can customize chat box, edit shortcuts or turn on/off automatic messages
- Agent profile settings and statistics

Application stability improvements and bug fixes.
Application stability improvements and bug fixes.
Application stability improvements and bug fixes.
Application stability improvements and bug fixes.
Application stability improvements and bug fixes.

Big update of Smartsupp app since last release. We added following new features:
- possibility to set up a sound notification
- notification of the new visitor
- share files or photos with customers
- conversations divided into Open / Closed
- log in with your Google account
- emojis for more personal communication
- assign conversation to multiple agents

We also worked on stability improvements and bug fixes.

We released an update for our mobile app. Here is what we worked on:
- Sign in with Apple
- Email channel addition
- New visitor notification
- Agent assignment from chat
- New attachements gallery -> picture and file viewing, sharing, download
- New messages statuses -> sent, viewed etc.
- Bug fixes and optimizations

We released an update for our mobile app. Here is what we worked on:
- Sign in with Apple
- Email channel addition
- New visitor notification
- Agent assignment from chat
- New attachements gallery -> picture and file viewing, sharing, download
- New messages statuses -> sent, viewed etc.
- Bug fixes and optimizations

- Added German language
- Resolve conversations using swipe gesture in conversations list
- Support for Facebook Messenger
